backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing implemented features, affected files, components, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark color palettes and base UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_RELEASE_NOTE.md: Play Store compliance and release planning document covering policies, risks, and operational guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling navigation between list/detail views and wiring settings, theme, and prompt data.
frontend/src/components/AboutDialog.tsx: Dialog component showing app and content-source information with policy-safe disclosure.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution and external link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding and controls for theme, settings, and the about dialog.
frontend/src/components/PromptDetail.tsx: Detailed prompt view with image, metadata, copy-to-clipboard, usage steps, and link to full page.
frontend/src/components/PromptList.tsx: Displays, sorts, and manages refresh/cache states for viral prompt cards with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a dialog UI for updating user settings such as theme, spacing, image visibility, and sort order.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Renders a button to toggle between light and dark themes using the theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an auth context for managing Internet Identity login, logout, status, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages theme state with system detection, storage, and DOM updates for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSettings.ts: Stores and updates user settings in localStorage with helpers for modifying individual fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useViralPrompts.ts: Fetches viral prompts with caching, error fallback, and helpers for refresh and cache clearing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with custom light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
Provides localStorage-based caching for viral prompts, including read/write, validation, timestamp handling, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/services/viralPromptsClient: Fetches viral prompts JSON with timeout, error handling, and structure validation via a custom FetchError class.
frontend/src/types/viralPrompts.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for ViralPrompt and the ViralPromptsResponse JSON structure.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Implements clipboard copy functionality using the Clipboard API with a textarea fallback.
frontend/src/utils/viralPrompts.ts: Provides helpers to build image and canonical URLs and to parse howToUse text into steps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, container settings, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, architecture, requirements, and known issues for building a hybrid Android app for viralprompts.in.
